lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Sasha Sloan
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Sasha Sloan
[00:12.170]Yelling at the sky
[00:15.070]Screaming at the world
[00:18.210]Baby, why'd you go away?
[00:20.870]I’m still your girl
[00:24.700]Holding on too tight
[00:27.860]Head up in the clouds
[00:31.210]Heaven only knows where you are now
[00:37.780]How do I love, how do I love again?
[00:44.050]How do I trust, how do I trust again?
[00:49.800]I stay up all night
[00:52.430]Tell myself I'm alright
[00:55.330]Baby, you're just harder to see than most
[01:01.969]I put the record on
[01:04.870]Wait ’til I hear our song
[01:08.230]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:14.930]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:21.939]Never got the chance
[01:25.189]To say you last goodbye
[01:28.709]I gotta move on
[01:31.319]But it hurts to try
[01:34.250]How do I love, how do I love again?
[01:40.950]How do I trust, how do I trust again?
[01:47.530]I stay up all night
[01:49.810]Tell myself I'm alright
[01:52.980]Baby, you're just harder to see than most
[01:59.050]I put the record on
[02:02.629]Wait 'til I hear our song
[02:05.829]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[02:12.469]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[02:19.840]How do I love, how do I love again?
[02:26.020]How do I trust, how do I trust again?
[02:32.210]I stay up all night
[02:34.539]Tell myself I’m alright
[02:37.710]Baby, you’re just harder to see than most
[02:44.910]I put the record on
[02:47.419]Wait 'til I hear our song
[02:50.639]Every night I’m dancing with your ghost
[02:57.139]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[03:03.520]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
tlyric:
[00:12.170]仰天嘶喊
[00:15.070]四顾哭嚎
[00:18.210]宝贝，你为什么要离我而去呢
[00:20.870]我依然是你的女孩
[00:24.700]紧紧抓着不放
[00:27.860]望向云端
[00:31.210]恐怕只有老天才知道你身处何方
[00:37.780]我该如何 如何再爱上某人
[00:44.050]我该怎样 怎样再敞开心扉
[00:49.800]我彻夜难眠
[00:52.430]骗自己一切都好
[00:55.330]宝贝你在这里只是难以看到
[01:01.969]我放起唱片
[01:04.870]等着听到我们的歌
[01:08.230]每晚我都与你的灵魂共舞
[01:14.930]每晚我都与你的灵魂共舞
[01:21.939]已然没有机会
[01:25.189]与你作最后的告别
[01:28.709]生活不停 我必须向前
[01:31.319]但每一步都走得痛彻心扉
[01:34.250]我该如何 如何再爱上某人
[01:40.950]我该怎样 怎样再敞开心扉
[01:47.530]我彻夜难眠
[01:49.810]骗自己一切都好
[01:52.980]骗自己你在这里只是难以看到
[01:59.050]我放起唱片
[02:02.629]等着听到我们的歌
[02:05.829]每晚我都与你的灵魂共舞
[02:12.469]每晚我都与你的灵魂共舞 
[02:19.840]我该如何 如何再爱上某人
[02:26.020]我该怎样 怎样再敞开心扉
[02:32.210]我彻夜难眠
[02:34.539]骗自己一切都好
[02:37.710]骗自己你在这里只是难以看到
[02:44.910]我放起唱片
[02:47.419]等着听到我们的歌
[02:50.639]每晚都会与你的灵魂共舞
